description: Heat on the trail comes in many forms. From hot and humid to dry and searing to just plain old mean and nasty. This Coolmax® air conditioner of a sock offers cooling comfort on even the balmiest of days.
name: Darn Tough Socks Hiker Coolmax Micro Crew Midweight Cushion Socks - Mens

specs.value: 55% Coolmax Polyester, 37% Nylon, 5% Acrylic, 3% Lycra Spandex
Hiking shoes, hiking boots, trail runners
